description: Please see attachment for full details. The notice is for a bid positioned in the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and includes requirements of quantitiy, duration and delivery of the contract.
full_summary:
# TASK-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement
## Solicitation Details

| **Attribute** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | 2023-15197 |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01013021 |
| Amendment Number | 2 |
| Notification Date | November 9, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | November 30, 2022, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time) |
| Amendment Date | November 16, 2022 |

## Contract Details

| **Attribute** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Expected Contract Start Date | Not specified |
| Expected Contract End Date | Not specified |
| Contracting Entity | Department of National Defence |
| Address | 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2, Canada |

## Tender Description

The Canadian government is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS). The tender is open to all eligible suppliers who can meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.

The contract is governed by the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA). The winning bidder will be selected through a competitive process, and the contract will be awarded after a thorough evaluation of proposals.

The contract will involve providing professional services for the Canadian government, including human resource services, business consulting, change management, and project management services.

## Important Documents

To obtain the solicitation documents, please visit [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The following documents are available:

* TASK-Based NPP (English)
* TASK-Based NPP (French)

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact Melissa Garlough at Melissa.Garlough@forces.gc.ca. Alternatively, you can also reach out to her at [60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K2H 8G1, Canada](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//60+Moodie+Dr,+Ottawa,+ON+K2H+8G1/@45.434481,-75.573958,13z/data=!4m13!1m7!3m6!1m5!1m1!1s0x4cce37319c1e99c7:0x2b90434344d9f29d!2m2!1d-75
